title: Question about my account
body: I received a notification that my account had been logged into from a different computer during a game (didn't log me off during game but as soon as the game was over). I reset my password, and log back in, and today i received a notification that a gift had been received by another account. I had my pay pal information saved for quicker access for payments. Is there anything I can do about the gifts that were sent out?

replies.body:
If you ever think that your account has been compromised or 'hacked' your best bet is to reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We'll be able to help with any fraudulent transactions that were made as well, so no worries there.

Also, be sure to stay signed out when you send that ticket!
